<h1><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1.</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>简介</span></h1>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1.1</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>诞生背景</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<strong>机器人是一种高度复杂的系统性实现</strong>，机器人设计包含了机械加工、机械结构设计、硬件设计、嵌入式软件设计、上层软件设计....是各种硬件与软件集成，甚至可以说机器人系统是当今工业体系的集大成者。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2123988/202506/2123988-20250618184455830-1776429133.png" alt="" width="407" height="271" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　机器人体系是相当庞大的，其复杂度之高，以至于没有任何个人、组织甚至公司能够独立完成系统性的机器人研发工作。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<strong>一种更合适的策略是：让机器人研发者专注于自己擅长的领域，其他模块则直接复用相关领域更专业研发团队的实现，当然自身的研究也可以被他人继续复用。</strong>这种基于"复用"的分工协作，遵循了不重复发明轮子的原则，显然是可以大大提高机器人的研发效率的，尤其是随着机器人硬件越来越丰富，软件库越来越庞大，这种复用性和模块化开发需求也愈发强烈。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　在此大背景下，<strong><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2007</span>年，一家名为柳树车库（<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Willow Garage</span>）的机器人公司发布了&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span>(机器人操作系统)</strong>，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>是一套机器人通用软件框架，可以提升功能模块的复用性，并且随着该系统的不断迭代与完善，如今&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>已经成为机器人领域的事实标准。 </span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2123988/202506/2123988-20250618184535068-845107544.png" alt="" width="480" height="320" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1.2</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>相关概念</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">　　<strong>★&nbsp; ROS&nbsp;</strong></span><strong>全称为 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Robot Operating System（</span>机器人操作系统）。</strong></span><br><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　★&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>是适用于机器人的开源元操作系统。</span></strong></span><br><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　★&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>集成了大量的工具，库，协议，提供类似&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">OS&nbsp;</span>所提供的功能，简化了对机器人的控制。</span></strong></span><br><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　★&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>提供了用于在多台计算机上获取，构建，编写和运行代码的工具和库，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>在某些方面类似于“机器人框架”。</span></strong></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>设计者将&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>表述为“<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS = Plumbing + Tools + Capabilities + Ecosystem</span>”，即 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 是通讯机制、工具软件包、机器人高层技能以及机器人生态系统的集合体。</strong></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2123988/202506/2123988-20250618185816623-1954900608.png" alt="" width="761" height="129" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1.3</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>设计目标</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　机器人开发的分工思想，实现了不同研发团队间的共享和协作，提升了机器人的研发效率，为了服务“ 分工”，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>主要设计了如下目标：</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><strong>　　✔ 代码复用：</strong><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>的目标不是成为具有最多功能的框架，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>的主要目标是支持机器人技术研发中的代码<em>重用</em>。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><strong><strong>　　✔&nbsp;</strong>分布式：</strong><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>是进程（也称为<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Nodes</span>）的分布式框架，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>中的进程可分布于不同主机，不同主机协同工作，从而分散计算压力。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><strong><strong>　　✔&nbsp;</strong>松耦合：</strong><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>中功能模块封装于独立的功能包或元功能包，便于分享，功能包内的模块以节点为单位运行，以&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>标准的&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">IO&nbsp;</span>作为接口，开发者不需要关注模块内部实现，只要了解接口规则就能实现复用,实现了模块间点对点的松耦合连接。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><strong><strong>　　✔&nbsp;</strong>精简：</strong><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>被设计为尽可能精简，以便为&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>编写的代码可以与其他机器人软件框架一起使用。ROS易于与其他机器人软件框架集成：<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>已与 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">OpenRAVE、</span><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Orocos&nbsp;</span>和&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Player&nbsp;</span>集成。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><strong><strong>　　✔&nbsp;</strong>语言独立性：</strong>包括<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Java，C++，Python</span>等。为了支持更多应用开发和移植，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>设计为一种语言弱相关的框架结构，使用简洁，中立的定义语言描述模块间的消息接口，在编译中再产生所使用语言的目标文件，为消息交互提供支持，同时允许消息接口的嵌套使用。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><strong><strong>　　✔&nbsp;</strong>易于测试：</strong><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>具有称为&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">rostest&nbsp;</span>的内置单元/集成测试框架，可轻松安装和拆卸测试工具。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><strong><strong>　　✔&nbsp;</strong>大型应用：</strong><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>适用于大型运行时系统和大型开发流程。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><strong><strong>　　✔&nbsp;</strong>丰富的组件化工具包：</strong><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>可采用组件化方式集成一些工具和软件到系统中并作为一个组件直接使用，如<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">RVIZ</span>（<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">3D</span>可视化工具），开发者根据&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>定义的接口在其中显示机器人模型等，组件还包括仿真环境和消息查看工具等。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px"><strong><strong>　　✔&nbsp;</strong>免费且开源：</strong>开发者众多，功能包多。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr>
<h2><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1.4</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>发展历程</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">　　ROS是一个由来已久、贡献者众多的大型软件项目。在&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>诞生之前，很多学者认为，机器人研究需要一个开放式的协作框架，并且已经有不少类似的项目致力于实现这样的框架。在这些工作中，斯坦福大学在<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2000</span>年年中开展了一系列相关研究项目，如斯坦福人工智能机器人（<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">STandford AI Robot, STAIR</span>）项目、个人机器人（<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Personal Robots, PR</span>）项目等，在上述项目中，在研究具有代表性、集成式人工智能系统的过程中，创立了用于室内场景的高灵活性、动态软件系统，其可以用于机器人学研究。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2007</span>年，柳树车库（<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Willow Garage</span>）提供了大量资源，用于将斯坦福大学机器人项目中的软件系统进行扩展与完善，同时，在无数研究人员的共同努力下，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 的核心思想和基本软件包逐渐得到完善。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>的发行版本（<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS distribution</span>）指&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>软件包的版本，其与<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Linux</span>的发行版本（如<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span>）的概念类似。推出&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>发行版本的目的在于使开发人员可以使用相对稳定的代码库，直到其准备好将所有内容进行版本升级为止。因此，每个发行版本推出后，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>开发者通常仅对这一版本的&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">bug&nbsp;</span>进行修复，同时提供少量针对核心软件包的改进。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">　　版本特点: 按照英文字母顺序命名，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>目前已经发布了&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS1&nbsp;</span>的终极版本：<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">noetic</span>，并建议后期过渡至&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS2&nbsp;</span>版本。<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">noetic</span> 版本之前默认使用的是&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Python2</span>，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">noetic&nbsp;</span>支持&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Python3</span>。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">　　<strong>【建议版本】: <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">noetic</span> 或 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">melodic</span> 或 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">kinetic</span>。</strong></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2123988/202506/2123988-20250618190810157-1237148083.jpg" alt="" width="532" height="1032" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h1 id="12-ros安装"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS&nbsp;</span>安装</span></h1>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>我们使用的是 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 版本是 </strong></span><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times"><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>Noetic</strong></span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">，因此</span></span>可以在 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu20.04</span>、<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Mac</span> 或 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Windows10</span> 系统上安装。虽然一般用户平时使用的操作系统以 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Windows</span> 居多，但是 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 之前的版本基本都不支持 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Windows<span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">，</span></span>所以当前我们选用的操作系统是 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu，</span>以方便向历史版本过渡。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<strong><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span> 安装常用方式有两种:</strong></span></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　✎&nbsp;方案<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1</span>：实体机安装 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span> (较为常用的是使用双系统，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Windows</span> 与 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span> 并存)。</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　✎&nbsp;方案<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2</span>：虚拟机安装 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span>。</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　两种方式比较，各有优缺点：</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　☃&nbsp;方案<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1</span>：可以保证性能，且不需要考虑硬件兼容性问题，但是和 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Windows</span> 系统交互不便。</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　☃&nbsp;方案<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2</span>：可以方便的实现 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Windows</span> 与 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span> 交互，不过性能稍差，且与硬件交互不便。</span></strong></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　在 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 中，一些仿真操作是比较耗费系统资源的，且经常需要和一些硬件(雷达、摄像头、<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">imu、STM32、arduino....</span>)交互，因此，<span style="color: rgba(0, 204, 255, 1)"><strong>原则上建议采用方案<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1</span>，不过如果只是出于学习目的，那么方案<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2</span>也基本够用，且方案<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2</span>在&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Windows&nbsp;</span>与 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span> 的交互上更为方便，对于学习者更为友好</strong></span>，因此本教程在此选用的是方案<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2</span>。当然，具体采用哪种实现方案，请按需选择。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<strong>如果采用虚拟机安装 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span>，再安装 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 的话，大致流程如下:</strong></span></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">1<span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">、</span></span>安装虚拟机软件(比如：<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">virtualbox</span> 或 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">VMware</span>)；</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2<span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">、</span></span>使用虚拟机软件虚拟一台主机；</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">3</span>、在虚拟主机上安装 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu 20.04</span>；</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">4</span>、在 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span> 上安装 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span>；</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">5</span>、测试 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 环境是否可以正常运行。</span></strong></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　虚拟机软件选择上，对于我们学习而言 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">virtualbox</span> 和 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">VMware</span> 都可以满足需求，二者比较，前者免费，后者收费。</span></p>

<h3><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.3.3</span>&nbsp;文件交互配置</span></h3>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　使用 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Xshell</span> 来操作服务非常方便，传文件也比较方便，就是使用<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">rz</span>，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">sz</span>。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　首先，服务器要安装了<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">rz</span>，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">sz<span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">：</span></span></span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">sudo</span> apt <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">install</span> lrzsz</pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　✎ 运行&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">sudo rz</span>&nbsp;，会将 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Windows</span> 的文件传到 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Linux</span> 服务。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　✎ 运行&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">sudo sz filename</span>&nbsp;，会将文件下载到 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Windows</span>本地。</span></p>

<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　①&nbsp;配置 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span> 的软件和更新；</span></p>

<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　③&nbsp;设置&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">key</span>；</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　④&nbsp;安装；</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　⑤&nbsp;配置环境变量；</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　</span><span style="font-size: 18px"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">　⑥&nbsp;</span></span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">安装构建依赖。</span></span></p>

<h3 id="1配置ubuntu的软件和更新"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.4.1</span> 配置 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span> 的软件和更新</span></h3>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　配置 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span> 的软件和更新，允许安装不经认证的软件。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　首先打开“软件和更新”对话框，具体可以在 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Ubuntu</span> 搜索按钮中搜索。</span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">打开后按照下图进行配置（确保勾选了"<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">restricted</span>"， "<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">universe</span>，" 和 "<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">multiverse</span>."）。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2123988/202506/2123988-20250620135819032-829038850.jpg" alt="" width="548" height="337" loading="lazy" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto"></p>

<h3><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">2.4.2</span> 设置安装源</span></h3>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<strong>配置国内南京大学的安装源：（推荐）</strong></span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>sudo sh -c '. /etc/lsb-release &amp;&amp; echo "deb http://mirrors.nju.edu.cn/ros/ubuntu/ `lsb_release -cs` main" &gt; /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ros-latest.list'</pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　或：官方默认安装源:</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">sudo</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">sh</span> -c <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">echo "deb http://packages.ros.org/ros/ubuntu $(lsb_release -sc) main" &gt; /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ros-latest.list</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span></pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　或：来自国内清华的安装源</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">sudo</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">sh</span> -c <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">. /etc/lsb-release &amp;&amp; echo "deb http://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ros/ubuntu/ `lsb_release -cs` main" &gt; /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ros-latest.list</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span></pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　或：来自国内中科大的安装源</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">

<h1 id="13-ros快速体验"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">3.</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 快速体验</span></h1>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　编写 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 程序，在控制台输出文本: <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Hello World</span>，分别使用 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">C++</span> 和 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Python</span> 实现。</span></p>
<h2 id="131-helloworld实现简介"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">3.1</span> <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Hello World</span> 实现简介</span></h2>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　ROS 中涉及的编程语言以 C++ 和 Python 为主，ROS 中的大多数程序两者都可以实现，在本系列教程中，每一个案例也都会分别使用 C++ 和 Python 两种方案演示，大家可以根据自身情况选择合适的实现方案。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　ROS 中的程序即便使用不同的编程语言，实现流程也大致类似，以当前 Hello World 程序为例，实现流程大致如下：</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　①&nbsp;先创建一个工作空间；</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　②&nbsp;再创建一个功能包；</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　③&nbsp;编辑源文件；</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　④&nbsp;编辑配置文件；</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　⑤&nbsp;编译并执行。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　上述流程中，C++ 和 Python 只是在步骤3和步骤4的实现细节上存在差异，其他流程基本一致。本节先实现 C++ 和 Python 程序编写的通用部分步骤1与步骤2，1.3.2节和1.3.3节再分别使用C++和Python编写HelloWorld。</span></p>
<h3 id="1创建工作空间并初始化"><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">3.1.1</span> 创建工作空间并初始化</span></h3>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">mkdir</span> -p 自定义空间名称/<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">src

cd 自定义空间名称

catkin_make</span></pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　上述命令，首先会创建一个工作空间以及一个 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">src </span>子目录，然后再进入工作空间调用&nbsp;<span class="cnblogs_code">catkin_make</span>&nbsp;命令编译。</span></p>
<h3><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">3.1.2</span> 进入 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">src</span> 创建 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ros&nbsp;</span>包并添加依赖</span></h3>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">cd src

catkin_create_pkg 自定义ROS包名 roscpp rospy std_msgs</span></pre>
</div>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　上述命令，会在工作空间下生成一个功能包，该功能包依赖于 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">roscpp</span>、<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">rospy</span> 与 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">std_msgs</span>，其中 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">roscpp</span> 是使用 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">C++</span> 实现的库，而 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">rospy</span> 则是使用 P<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ython</span> 实现的库，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">std_msgs</span> 是标准消息库，创建 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 功能包时，一般都会依赖这三个库实现。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">注意:</span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 204, 255, 1)">在 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 中，虽然实现同一功能时，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">C++</span> 和 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Python</span> 可以互换，但是具体选择哪种语言，需要视需求而定。</span><span style="color: rgba(204, 153, 255, 1)">两种语言相较而言: <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">C++</span> 运行效率高但是编码效率低，而 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">Python</span> 则反之。</span>基于二者互补的特点，<span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 设计者分别设计了 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">roscpp</span> 与 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">rospy</span> 库，前者旨在成为 <span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">ROS</span> 的高性能库，而后者则一般用于对性能无要求的场景，旨在提高开发效率。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><span style="font-size: 18pt"><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">3.2</span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">HelloWorld</span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">（</span><span style="font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times">C++</span><span style="font-family: 楷体, &quot;Kaiti SC&quot;">版）</span></span></h2>
